data.question: What is the empirical formula of UMUMOF-(E)-3?
At what temperature were the intensities for UMUMOF-(E)-3 registered?
What is the crystal system of UMUMOF-(E)-3?
What space group does UMUMOF-(E)-3 belong to?
What is the volume of the unit cell for UMUMOF-(E)-3?
What is the density (calculated) of UMUMOF-(E)-3?
How many reflections were collected for UMUMOF-(E)-3?
What is the final R index (R1) for UMUMOF-(E)-3 with I>2sigma(I)?
What is the largest difference peak for UMUMOF-(E)-3?
Is the crystal structure of UMUMOF-(Z)-3 fully solved?
data.answer: No, the crystal structure of UMUMOF-(Z)-3 was not fully solved.

data.question: Does UMUMOF-(E)-3 have a higher density than UMUMOF-(Z)-3?
data.answer: The document does not provide the density of UMUMOF-(Z)-3 for comparison.

data.question: Was the photoisomerization reaction of UMUMOF-(E)-3 to UMUMOF-(Z)-3 successful?
data.answer: Yes, the photoisomerization reaction was successful, changing the E/Z ratio.

data.question: Can UMUMOF-(E)-3 be recovered to its original state after releasing p-benzoquinone?
data.answer: Yes, UMUMOF-(E)-3 can be recovered to its original state after releasing p-benzoquinone by heating.

data.question: Is the solvent-accessible volume of UMUMOF-(E)-3 greater than 20%?
data.answer: No, the solvent-accessible volume of UMUMOF-(E)-3 is exactly 20.1%.

data.question: Does the thermal treatment at 140 °C change the E/Z olefin ratio in UMUMOFs?
data.answer: Yes, thermal treatment at 140 °C changes the E/Z olefin ratio in UMUMOFs.

data.question: What is the effect of irradiation wavelength on the photoisomerization of UMUMOF-(E)-3?
data.answer: Irradiation wavelength affects the E/Z ratio, with different wavelengths leading to different ratios.

data.question: How does the crystal size of UMUMOF-(E)-3 affect its photoisomerization?
data.answer: The crystal size does not significantly affect the E/Z ratio after photoisomerization.

data.question: What determines the release rate of p-benzoquinone from UMUMOF-(E)-3?
data.answer: The release rate of p-benzoquinine is influenced by the solvent used.

data.question: How does heating influence the release of p-benzoquinone from UMUMOF-(E)-3?
data.answer: Heating at 40 °C increases the release rate of p-benzoquinone from UMUMOF-(E)-3.

data.question: Can the E/Z ratio of UMUMOFs be controlled through photoisomerization?
data.answer: Yes, the E/Z ratio of UMUMOFs can be controlled through photoisomerization.
